Reflections upon the murder of S. Edmund-Bury Godfrey the design of Thompson, Farwell, and Paine to sham off that murder from the papists : the late endeavours to prove Stafford a martyr and no traitor, and the particular kindnesses of the Observator, and Heraclitus to the whole design, in a dialogue ; with a dedication from Mrs. Cellier. Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.
[4], 32 p.
Printed for A.B. and published by L. Curtiss, London : 1682.
Dedication signed: Eliz. Cellier. Imperfect: print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======
